column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=DS : Where was your mom during all this ?
#Text=BW :
#Text=She was trying to make a household and trying to keep the place as sane as she possibly could .
#Text=West moves to Boston after his parents divorce
#Text=DS : It does n’t sound like she was very successful .
#Text=BW :
#Text=She had to leave him .
#Text=She came into the sixth grade one day .
#Text=I saw my mother at school and I was mortified like any other kid would be .
#Text=She talked to the teacher and they went out in the hall .
#Text=My mom came and I went with her to the airport .
#Text=It was like going on a trip .
#Text=We got out of Detroit , Michigan and we were on a plane to Boston .
#Text=Me and my two brothers .
#Text=One was a baby and the other one was like , gosh , he had to be seven or six because I was about eleven .
#Text=This was back in 1963 .
#Text=DS : When did you come to a realization that your voice was something that you wanted to turn into a career ?
#Text=I ’d go out and kick the shit out of some little cat or something , just like you know , smack it ...
#Text=In a weird way , in a weird permutation of the whole situation , to me that was supposed to be love .
#Text=Cause why would your parent hit you , hurt you ? Why ?
#Text=It never makes sense to a kid .
#Text=And they all used to say , ' It ’s because I care about you . '
#Text=But I got over that stuff and what I did was start to hurt myself .
#Text=—
#Text=West on abusing animals to deal with his own abuse
#Text=BW :
#Text=It never was a realization .
#Text=I started playing trumpet in grade school when I was ten years old and I liked the idea of going on stage and playing .
#Text=And I was in a couple of plays in school and I really liked that world .
#Text=I felt totally at home with it cause you had to be ready for anything and you had to be vigilant and you had to be on your toes , which actors need as skill and survival tools .
#Text=So it was the perfect place for me to be .
#Text=It ’s not like I was a hollow , empty vessel .
#Text=I had plenty of things percolating inside and all that , but I needed to be where I to be where I felt good and I never fit in with other kids .
#Text=I only had , like , two friends , maybe one , who was , “ You like that comic book too ? ”
#Text=You know , that kind of stuff .
#Text=Getting called faygot by any random goon .
#Text=DS : Did you say fay or faggot ?
#Text=BW :
#Text=No , it ’s faggot , but they would pronounce it fay -got , you know , in Boston .
#Text=Fay
#Text=got .
#Text=What are you , fay got ?
#Text=What are you , queer ?
